TABLE.NAME: report_apocalypse
TABLE.COMMENT: Report outlining the presence of Flash components within activities

FIELD.NAME: coursefullname
FIELD.COMMENT: Full name of course, limited to 254 chars as per mdl_course table

FIELD.NAME: courseurl
FIELD.COMMENT: An HTML link to the course in question

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of component or legacy if pre-Moodle 2.0

FIELD.NAME: activityurl
FIELD.COMMENT: An HTML link to the activity in question

FIELD.NAME: html5present
FIELD.COMMENT: 0 if no html5 detected for activity, 1 if html5 detected
